product_name: Pearl Izumi Ultra Short-Sleeve Top - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Built to keep you comfortable no matter how many miles you log, the Pearl Izumi Ultra women's short-sleeve top features soft fabric plus shoulder tread that helps keep pack straps in place. Rubberized tread on the shoulders keeps hydration pack or backpack straps in place while you're on the go. Lightweight, breathable polyester fabric wicks moisture away and dries quickly to keep your skin cool and dry. Pearl Izumi Ultra women's short-sleeve top features a semifitted cut. Closeout.
short_description: Built to keep you comfortable no matter how many miles you log, the Pearl Izumi Ultra women's short-sleeve top features soft fabric plus shoulder tread that helps keep pack straps in place.
